title: Rooming With Ash
description: "Why did you change?” I asked. “Because of this girl I met who loves running from the cops with me. She's pretty damn awesome.” I blushed as I looked up at him. “I think you’re a bad influence.” “And I think you like it.” ** One summer in Hawaii is all it takes to change Keira Sullivan's life. Rooming with the notorious hottie, Ash Moretti, is going to make this a summer to remember.
author: Zee King
